attributes.action: Add Astronomy as a compulsory subject
attributes.additional_details:
This petition intends to see that "Astronomy" is added as a compulsory subject in Key Stages 1, 2, 3 and 4.

The main point of this is inspiration, if we can inspire younger people so they get involved in astronomy and the space industry then we will have more exciting developments in that field.

But your school doesn't have a telescope? No problem, planetarium software is a good substitute.
